header: close_entries_rule='FIFO', pyramiding=0, process_orders_on_close=true, overlay=true, linktoseries=true, default_qty_type=strategy.percent_of_equity, default_qty_value=100, initial_capital=1000, slippage=4, commission_type=strategy.commission.percent, commission_value=0.1, currency=currency.USD
date_range:
// Date range variables: format: year, month, day, hours, minutes
end_period = timestamp(2021, 11, 25, 23, 59)

// Date range: 3 weeks
weeks_3_start = timestamp(2021, 11, 4, 00, 00)
weeks_3_window() =>
    time >= weeks_3_start and time <= end_period ? true : false

//Date range: 8 weeks
weeks_8_start = timestamp(2021, 9, 30, 00, 00)
weeks_8_window() =>
    time >= weeks_8_start and time <= end_period ? true : false

// Date range: 16 weeks
weeks_16_start = timestamp(2021, 8, 5, 00, 00)
weeks_16_window() =>
    time >= weeks_16_start and time <= end_period ? true : false

// Date range: 32 weeks
weeks_32_start = timestamp(2021, 3, 25, 00, 00)
weeks_32_window() =>
    time >= weeks_32_start and time <= end_period ? true : false

// Date range: All 2021
all_2021_start = timestamp(2021, 1, 1, 00, 00)
all_2021_window() =>
    time >= all_2021_start and time <= end_period ? true : false

// Date range: Bad period for BTC (13 apr 2021 -> 20 jul 2021 (63,506 - 29,807 = 53% loss))
bad_btc_period_start = timestamp(2021, 4, 13, 00, 00)
bad_btc_period_end = timestamp(2021, 7, 20, 23, 59)
bad_btc_window() =>
    time >= bad_btc_period_start and time <= bad_btc_period_end ? true : false

// Date range: open
open_range_start = timestamp(2021, 01, 01, 00, 00)
open_range_end = timestamp(2100, 7, 20, 23, 59)
open_range_window() =>
    time >= open_range_start and time <= open_range_end ? true : false

// Date range: UI dropdown inputs
date_range_choices = input(title='Date Range', type=input.string, defval='Open range', options=['All 2021', '32 weeks', '16 weeks', '8 weeks', '3 weeks', 'Bad period BTC', 'Open range'])
date_range = date_range_choices == 'All 2021' ? all_2021_window() : date_range_choices == '32 weeks' ? weeks_32_window() : date_range_choices == '16 weeks' ? weeks_16_window() : date_range_choices == '8 weeks' ? weeks_8_window() : date_range_choices == '3 weeks' ? weeks_3_window() : date_range_choices == 'Bad period BTC' ? bad_btc_window() : date_range_choices == 'Open range' ? open_range_window() :na
